page.title: 05THE SEA AT GURNARD.
page.content: Off Princes Esplanade there is a current mast in the sea. If you go past the mast when you are swimming it could be dangerous .It is nice to swim there.in the summer there is a raft in the sea that you can dive off.There is a putting green and beach huts that people use.By the beach is a pub called the Woodvale.Lots of people bring there speed boats to Gurnard and they go water skiing in the bay.You put long skis on and you hold a tow rope attached to the boat.You have to lie in the water and let the boat pull you up.The best time and place to go fishing is just off Burnt Wood on a rising tide.The best catch is cod there are whole shoals of them.If you want plaice you have to wait until night when the tide comes in and the plaice shoals come up.Occasionally you can catch the odd skate.
